short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sick of all the false metal fans in your life? Make them trve with Trve Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: From the frostbitten northern reaches of the internet, I present you Trve Chrome: When other metal people are false, Trve Chrome is there for you. When someone meant to write Lemmy but wrote God accidentally, Trve Chrome is there for you. This is vvhat happens when metaljerk gets bored. Vsers should only install this upon penalty of burned and died.
